title: n8n Overview
description: Monitor n8n workflow automation performance, health, and resource utilization.

definition.content:
# n8n Workflow Automation

This dashboard provides comprehensive observability for your n8n instance, including:
- Workflow execution metrics
- Queue job performance
- Cache efficiency
- Node.js runtime health
- System resource utilization
Monitor workflow execution health, success rates, and performance.
Track job queue health, throughput, and latency.
Monitor cache hit rates and performance.
Track API request rates and HTTP response times.
Monitor Node.js event loop, memory, and garbage collection.
Monitor process resources, uptime, and instance health.
Track event bus health and throughput.
